name: Presidential Power
description:
Welcome to Presidential Power, in this game you must gain supporters to retain your presidency as it is about to be stolen from you in this upcoming election... After all, being president gives you the most powerful, power source.

Controls
- Click: Interact
- 0-9: Enter numbers
- Enter/Return - Submit numbers
- WASD - Quick Time Events

Credits
- Jethro (Claith) - Most programming, some art
- Joshua (Computurtle) - Most art, some programming

This was created as a submission to the One Script Jam. We had 1 week and the theme was Power Source.

Packages Used
- Text Mesh Pro
- Sprite Editor

Source Code: https://github.com/Computurtle/one-script-jam-2020
